verses.text: It came to pass after \w this|strong="H0310"\w* also, \add that\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and with them \add other\add* beside the \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* against \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Then there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* some that \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* against thee from \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* on this side \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*; and, behold, they \add be\add* in \w Hazazon-tamar|strong="H2688"\w*, which \add is\add* \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w throughout|strong="H5921"\w* all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 20.3 \ft himself: Heb. his face\f*

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, to \w ask|strong="H1245"\w* \add help\add* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: even out of all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add art\add* not thou \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*? and \w rulest|strong="H4910"\w* \add not\add* thou over all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*? and in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is there not\add* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, so that none is able to \w withstand|strong="H3320"\w* thee?

\add Art\add* not thou our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add who\add* didst drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* it to the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H0157"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*?\f + \fr 20.7 \ft who: Heb. thou\f*
And they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein, and have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thee a \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* therein for thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

If, \add when\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* upon us, \add as\add* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w judgment|strong="H8196"\w*, or \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, or \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, we \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and in thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, (for thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,) and \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto thee in our \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w*, then thou wilt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* and \w help|strong="H3467"\w*.

And now, behold, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* and \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, whom thou wouldest not \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w invade|strong="H0935"\w*, when they came \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, but they \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* from them, and \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them not;

Behold, \add I say, how\add* they \w reward|strong="H1580"\w* us, to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to cast us \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of thy \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*, which thou hast given us to \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w*.

O our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, wilt thou not \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* them? for we have no \w might|strong="H3581"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* this \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w company|strong="H1995"\w* that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* against us; neither \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* what to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: but our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* upon thee.

And all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w with|strong="H1571"\w* their little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

¶ Then upon \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, a \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, came the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*;

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hearken|strong="H7181"\w* ye, all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and thou \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto you, Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* nor \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of this \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*; for the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \add is\add* not yours, but \w God’s|strong="H0430"\w*.

To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* go ye \w down|strong="H3381"\w* against them: behold, they come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w cliff|strong="H4608"\w* of \w Ziz|strong="H6732"\w*; and ye shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* them at the \w end|strong="H5490"\w* of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Jeruel|strong="H3385"\w*.\f + \fr 20.16 \ft cliff: Heb. ascent\f*\f + \fr 20.16 \ft brook: or, valley\f*

Ye shall not \add need\add* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* in \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \add battle:\add* \w set|strong="H3320"\w* yourselves, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* ye \add still\add*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with you, O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*; to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* them: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add will be\add* with you.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w bowed|strong="H6915"\w* his head with \add his\add* \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w worshipping|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*, and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Korhites|strong="H7145"\w*, stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* on \w high|strong="H4605"\w*.

¶ And they rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*: and as they went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* me, O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w Believe|strong="H0539"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, so shall ye be \w established|strong="H0539"\w*; \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* his \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, so shall ye \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.

And when he had \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and that should \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \w beauty|strong="H1927"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*, as they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w army|strong="H2502"\w*, and to \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Praise|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.  +  r 20.21  t that…: Heb. praisers *

¶ And \w when|strong="H6256"\w* they \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w sing|strong="H7440"\w* and to \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w ambushments|strong="H0693"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, which were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and they were \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w*.\f + \fr 20.22 \ft And when…: Heb. And in the time that they, etc\f*\f + \fr 20.22 \ft to sing…: Heb. in singing and praise\f*\f + \fr 20.22 \ft they were…: or, they smote one another\f*

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* stood \w up|strong="H5975"\w* against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, utterly to \w slay|strong="H2763"\w* and \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \add them:\add* and when they had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H4889"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*.\f + \fr 20.23 \ft to destroy: Heb. for the destruction\f*

And when \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* toward the watch \w tower|strong="H4707"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, they \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* unto the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, and, behold, they \add were\add* dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and none \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w*.\f + \fr 20.24 \ft none…: Heb. there was not an escaping\f*

And when \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to take \w away|strong="H0962"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of them, they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among them in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* both \w riches|strong="H7399"\w* with the dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w*, which they stripped \w off|strong="H5337"\w* for themselves, more \w than|strong="H0369"\w* they could carry \w away|strong="H4853"\w*: and they were \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in \w gathering|strong="H0962"\w* of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, it was so \w much|strong="H7227"\w*.

¶ And on the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* themselves in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Berachah|strong="H1294"\w*; for there they \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: therefore the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the same \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, The \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Berachah|strong="H1294"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 20.26 \ft Berachah: that is, blessing\f*

Then they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* in the \w forefront|strong="H7218"\w* of them, to go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had made them to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 20.27 \ft forefront: Heb. head\f*

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* and \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was on all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of \add those\add* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, when they had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So the \w realm|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* was \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*: for his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* gave him \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: \add he was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Azubah|strong="H5806"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Shilhi|strong="H7977"\w*.

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from it, \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Howbeit the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*: for as yet the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* had not \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, who \add is\add* \w mentioned|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 20.34 \ft book of Jehu: Heb. words, etc\f*\f + \fr 20.34 \ft is mentioned: Heb. was made to ascend\f*

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* this did \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w join|strong="H2266"\w* himself with \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w did|strong="H6213"\w* very \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*:

And he \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* himself with him to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*: and they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* in \w Ezion-geber|strong="H6100"\w*.

Then \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodavah|strong="H1735"\w* of \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* against \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Because thou hast \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* thyself with \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w broken|strong="H6555"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*. And the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* were \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, that they were not \w able|strong="H6113"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*.
